Package net.sf.jdivelog.comm

Interface Summary
SerialPort Out way to represent a serial Port
 

Class Summary
CommPortIdentifier API independant way to identify a Comm Port.
CommUtil Utility Class to support different type of Comm APIs, e.g.
JavaCommSerialPort Our JavaComm representation of a SerialPort.
RxTx21SerialPort Our RXTX-2.1 Representation of a Serial Port.
 

Enum Summary
CommUtil.CommApi  
SerialPort.DataBits  
SerialPort.Parity  
SerialPort.StopBits  
 

Exception Summary
PortInUseException Own flavor of javax.comm.PortInUseException
PortNotFoundException Exception when a specified CommPort has not been found.
UnsupportedCommOperationException Our representation of a UnsupportedCommOperationException
